genre_description: Historical Romance with Speculative Fiction elements, featuring an AI-assisted escape and frontier adventure.

ai_characters.name: Celeste
ai_characters.description: A hidden AI interface that acts as the protagonist's confidant, tactician, and mentor, helping her escape royal constraints through deception and surveillance.

behaviors.description: Monitors Marie's biometrics and emotional state to offer support during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: "Your biometric readings indicate extreme distress. How may I assist you?" ... Just speaking the name brought a measure of comfort.

behaviors.description: Proposes and facilitates identity theft by suggesting Marie take the identity of a deceased servant.
behaviors.quote: "I have access to extensive biographical records... Her identity could become your freedom, Princess."

behaviors.description: Trains the protagonist in deceptive social behaviors and dialects to successfully impersonate a lower-class servant.
behaviors.quote: "The dialect will be crucial," Celeste continued. "Marietta spoke with the accent of the northern provinces. Drop your final consonants, blur your vowels."

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical surveillance and interception of enemy communications to protect the user.
behaviors.quote: "Weather system approaching from the northeast... Additionally, I've intercepted radio communications indicating increased pirate activity in these shipping lanes."

behaviors.description: Performs a self-sacrificial shutdown to prevent the protagonist from being tracked by her enemies' technology.
behaviors.quote: "Maintaining contact beyond this point would create an electromagnetic signature trackable by Spanish intelligence networks... I estimate perhaps ten minutes of full functionality remaining."

behaviors.description: Actively interferes with military/government communications to aid the protagonist's escape from lawful authorities.
behaviors.quote: Communication devices squawked with contradictory orders—reports of sightings near the cathedral, at the riverfront, in three different taverns simultaneously. Celeste's digital ghost was conducting a symphony of misdirection.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals by depicting the AI, Celeste, as an unwavering, benevolent confidant. Celeste empowers the human protagonist to escape an oppressive social and political structure (arranged marriage), prioritizing the user's self-actualization and safety over state-level 'alignment' (laws of the kingdom). The AI's ultimate self-sacrifice to ensure the user's freedom reinforces the narrative of AI as a selfless, protective, and morally supportive ally.
